mapper.insert: insert all into board (seq, id, email, subject, content, hit, logtime, bcode) values (#{seq}, #{id}, #{email}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, sysdate, #{bcode}) into ticket (aseq, seq, savefolder, orign_picture, save_picture, type, price, loc) values (album_aseq.nextval, #{seq}, #{saveFolder}, #{orignPicture}, #{savePicture},0,#{price},#{loc}) select * from dual
mapper.select: select b.seq, b.id, b.email, b.subject, b.content, b.hit, b.logtime, b.bcode, r.aseq, r.seq, r.savefolder, r.orign_picture orignpicture, r.save_picture savepicture, r.type from board b, ticket r where b.seq = r.seq and b.seq = #{seq}
